name: Max Pickles Part II: The Mine of Doom
overview: By getting the map of the diamonds mine, Max got to arrive to such mysterious place, eager to get fortune and respect. For his rejoice, he found diamonds of many pounds of weight. However, he found out the same castles' spirits were now controlling numerous objects within the mine, thus protecting the precious treasure. Your mission is to help Max to get the diamonds without dying in the experience. Structure and concepts ---------------------- - The mine is represented by 12 screens-levels in which one single exit is present, a door which will only open when getting all the diamonds in the screen. - Max got 3 lives and a bar representing his energy, which decreases with every contact with enemies and also as time passes. This bar is refilled when the screen is passed. - Max will score points for each diamond, and also, according to the remaining energy when passing each screen. - Max can climb ladders, and activate objects just pushing them with direction keys.
